languages.text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, боюсь, кто-то из моих подданных выдал свое творение за дар Идекса. Наверное, чтобы добавить веса подношению".

traits.locale_text: "Может, век. Может, два. Я уже давно не считаю годы своей жизни, Ваше Сиятельство".

languages.text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
languages.original_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, боюсь, кто-то из моих подданных выдал свое творение за дар Идекса. Наверное, чтобы добавить веса подношению".

traits.locale_text: "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off his creation as the bounty of Idex. Perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off his creation as the bounty of Idex. Perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
"My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."
"My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，这恐怕是我的臣民把他们自己的造物冒充成了来自艾德克斯的恩赐。或许，这是为了让我们的礼物显得更有分量吧。”
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，这恐怕是我的臣民把他们自己的造物冒充成了来自艾德克斯的恩赐。或许，这是为了让我们的礼物显得更有分量吧。”

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, me temo que uno de mis súbditos ha presentado una de sus obras como si fuera el tributo de Idex, quizá con objeto de añadir más peso a la ofrenda».
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, me temo que uno de mis súbditos ha presentado una de sus obras como si fuera el tributo de Idex, quizá con objeto de añadir más peso a la ofrenda».

languages.text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, korkarım ki halkımdan birileri kendi tasarımlarını İdex lütfu gibi göstermeye çalışarak hediyeye daha fazla değer biçmek istemiş."
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, korkarım ki halkımdan birileri kendi tasarımlarını İdex lütfu gibi göstermeye çalışarak hediyeye daha fazla değer biçmek istemiş."

languages.text: 「閣下、残念ながら、私の部下の一人が自分の創作物をイデックスの懸賞金として通してしまったようです。おそらく、贈り物により重みを加えようとしたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、残念ながら、私の部下の一人が自分の創作物をイデックスの懸賞金として通してしまったようです。おそらく、贈り物により重みを加えようとしたのでしょう」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je crains que l'un de mes sujets n'ait fait passer sa propre création pour la prime d'Idex, sans doute pour donner plus de poids à son offrande. »
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je crains que l'un de mes sujets n'ait fait passer sa propre création pour la prime d'Idex, sans doute pour donner plus de poids à son offrande. »

languages.text: "{mf|Herr|Herrin}, ich fürchte, einer meiner Untertanen hat sein eigenes Werk als Geschenk von Idex ausgegeben, vielleicht, um der Gabe mehr Gewicht zu verleihen."
languages.original_text: "My {mf|lord|lady}, I am afraid one of my subjects has passed off their own creation as the bounty of Idex, perhaps to add more weight to the offering."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Herr|Herrin}, ich fürchte, einer meiner Untertanen hat sein eigenes Werk als Geschenk von Idex ausgegeben, vielleicht, um der Gabe mehr Gewicht zu verleihen."
